attributes.action: Get schools to help with peoples mental health
attributes.additional_details: As some students are struggling with mental health and some schools are not helping students out.
attributes.background: To assist schools support students with there mental health

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for mental health support in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607356

Create a statutory Mental Health & Wellbeing Policy for all schools & colleges: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611264

Make ‘Mental Health Studies’ a separate subject in the National Curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617834

If you want the Government to take a different action to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
